name: Needo Needs You!
description:
Needo Needs You! is a time-limited, online-connected visual novel. In it, you will learn about Needo's life story and make a decision about whether or not he deserves to go 'up' or 'down' from purgatory. This choice will be uploaded to a database.

On March 3rd, 2021, the votes will be collated and Needo's ultimate fate sealed. At this point, the game is over.
